text.autoconfig.compass3d.title: Compass3D
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.disable: Disables the mod so that overlay icons are not displayed.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.stacked: Scale of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
Horizontal offset of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
Vertical offset of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
In/out offset of the icon on stacked compasses to prevent overlap with stack count.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.transla: The horizontal offset of the icon, from left to right.
The vertical offset of the icon, from top to bottom.
In/out offset. Use when other mods cover / are covered by this.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.vanilla: The following settings can be used to change or disable the icons shown on specific compasses. DEFAULT uses the default arrows, or the arrows set by resource packs. MATCH_COMPASS_STYLE will use the icon designed to match the colors of the compass. DISABLED disables the mod for that kind of compass.
For this compass, there is no difference between DEFAULT and MATCH_COMPASS_STYLE.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.lodesto: For this compass, there is no difference between DEFAULT and MATCH_COMPASS_STYLE.
text.autoconfig.compass3d.option.netheri: Added by another mod; has no effect if that mod is not present.
